description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
	

 

NETWORKNET-34093 EML to MHTML: Characters in message turned garbage

NETWORKNET-34095 TemplateEngine misses filling the field

NETWORKNET-34101 Embedded XLSX extracted from RTF body doesn't open in Excel

NETWORKNET-34110 ImapClient: Subject and Sender Info not populated properly in some cases in ImapMessageInfo

NETWORKNET-34112 ICS added to PST raises error "Recurrance pattern not valid" when viewed in outlook

NETWORKNET-34115 Category lost when MSG added to PST

NETWORKNET-34116 Exception when EML with DOCX attachment loaded using MailMessage

NETWORKNET-34118 MailMessage: Floating text box is lost when MSG loaded and resaved

NETWORKNET-34126 Meeting does not appears when Outlook opens ics file of calendar, created by MapiMessage.

NETWORKNET-34127 PST: AddMessage gives System.IndexOutOfRangeException:Index was outside the bounds of the array

NETWORKNET-34082 Sometimes AE loads 100% of CPU time for several hours.

NETWORKNET-34085 Custom property added by Aspose.Email cannot be read using Outlook Interop and Outlook Spy

Enhancement

NETWORKNET-33909 Support for IMCEAFAX format in the recipient address

NETWORKNET-34106 Provide SetLicense(File) method
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
